title: Midnight Sons, Volume 3: The Last Two Bachelors: Falling for Him/Ending in Marriage
description: One of Debbie's most beloved series, featuring the O'Halloran brothers, concludes this July with a special 2-in-1 collector's edition of the final two books. "The Last Two Bachelors" features Falling For Him and Ending In Marriage.
author: Debbie Macomber
